body:
All Versions

  • Refined provider search so that hospitals appear sooner in the results

Network360 Only

  • Added advanced option to Compare Networks page that allows Network Comparisons to be done using provider location counts as well as provider counts
  • Fixed a bug that caused the net change graph of the Compare Networks Volatility quadrant to appear clickable even though it wasn't

Network360edge Only

  • Added a disclaimer that appears during logon and when viewing provider results or exporting a Network Ranking
